greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A128132 * A007318.
formula: A128132 * A007318 as infinite lower triangular matrices (assuming the top of the Pascal triangle A007318 is shifted from (0,0) to (1,1)).
T(n,k) = n*binomial(n-1, k-1) - binomial(n-2, k-1)*[n <> k] for 1 <= k <= n, where [ ] is the Iverson bracket.
T(n,k) = T(n-1,k) + T(n-1,k-1) + binomial(n-1,k-1) for 2 <= k <= n with (n,k) <> (2,2).
example: Triangle T(n,k) (with rows n >= 1 and columns k = 1..n) begins:
